document.full_text: a crucial white house meeting between president obama and congressional leaders to try to solve a budget impasse ended thursday night with no deal but progress on some issues, mr. obama said.
document.title: white house meeting on budget fails to end impasse
lines_and_colors: a crucial white house meeting between president obama and congressional leaders to try to solve a budget impasse ended thursday night with no deal but progress on some issues, mr. obama said.
